title: Noah's Faith Quiz 4
description: Questions about faith and obedience for youth - Part 4

questions.text: What can we learn from Noah's example of faith?

options.text: Faith leads to action and obedience
options.explanation: Hebrews 11:7 shows Noah's faith led him to prepare the ark in reverent fear, becoming heir of righteousness.
True faith results in obedient action, as Noah demonstrated.
Noah's faith was demonstrated through his complete obedience to God's commands.
